name: part_002
file: tmp_【HOPE TO THE FUTURE 3D LIVE】 IRyS 2024 Birthday Live! #IRySBDay [cc5SQqswwMM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: IRyS performs 'Tojisha', the ending theme from Psycho-Pass: Providence.
MC section where IRyS introduces herself, the theme of her live (Sci-fi Anime Songs), and the spaceship stage design.
Start of the guest medley. Tokino Sora and AZKi join IRyS for the first song.
scenes.song_name: 名前のない怪物 (Namae no Nai Kaibutsu)

subtitles.original: 他人の痛みを描い 心と寄り添う
subtitles.english: Imaging others' pain and drawing close to their hearts

subtitles.original: 人はこんなにも 美しいのに
subtitles.english: Even though people are so beautiful...

subtitles.original: 理由を見つけ 憎しみ合うんだね
subtitles.english: ...they find reasons to hate one another.

subtitles.original: 生まれたことに 意味がなきゃいられないんだね
subtitles.english: They can't bear not having a meaning for their existence.

subtitles.original: ならこれが私の答えだから
subtitles.english: If that's the case, then this is my answer.

subtitles.original: 命が冷える 優しさのせいで
subtitles.english: Life turns cold because of kindness.

subtitles.original: 弱さが罪と言うなら 応えて
subtitles.english: If weakness is a sin, then answer me.

subtitles.original: 私は誰を犠牲に生き
subtitles.english: At the expense of whom do I live?

subtitles.original: 銃口を向けたあなたに見えるように
subtitles.english: So that you, with your gun pointed, can see.

subtitles.original: そして銃声が響く
subtitles.english: And then, a gunshot rings out.

subtitles.original: 遠くで聞こえる 罵声と絶叫
subtitles.english: Curses and screams can be heard from afar.

subtitles.original: 正義を問いかける
subtitles.english: Questioning what justice is.

subtitles.original: 私は生きる あなたを犠牲に
subtitles.english: I will live at your expense.

subtitles.original: 自らの手を汚すこと
subtitles.english: Getting my own hands dirty...

subtitles.original: 怯えないで 私は当事者になる
subtitles.english: ...don't be afraid. I will become the person concerned.

subtitles.original: 今
subtitles.english: Now.

subtitles.original: HiRyS, it's IRyS from Hololive English!
subtitles.english: HiRyS, it's IRyS from Hololive English!

subtitles.original: Thank you very much for coming to my very first 3D birthday live, Hope to the Future!
subtitles.english: Thank you very much for coming to my very first 3D birthday live, Hope to the Future!

subtitles.original: Yay!
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 初めての、えっと、3Dバースデーライブへ来てくださりありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for coming to my first, uh, 3D birthday live.

subtitles.original: 今回はね、えっと、『Hope to the Future』というタイトルのライブになっています。
subtitles.english: This time, uh, the live is titled "Hope to the Future."

subtitles.original: This time my live is based on a sci-fi anime song theme.
subtitles.english: This time my live is based on a sci-fi anime song theme.

subtitles.original: If you've noticed, my first two songs were "Sousei no Aquarion" and "Tojisha"...
subtitles.english: If you've noticed, my first two songs were "Sousei no Aquarion" and "Tojisha"...

subtitles.original: ...both from sci-fi animes. Yes, let's go! Because sci-fi is my favorite anime genre.
subtitles.english: ...both from sci-fi animes. Yes, let's go! Because sci-fi is my favorite anime genre.

subtitles.original: 今回のテーマはSFアニソンになっています。
subtitles.english: The theme this time is sci-fi anime songs.

subtitles.original: 先ほどの2曲もね、SFアニソンになってるかなと思います。
subtitles.english: I think the two previous songs were also sci-fi anime songs.

subtitles.original: 『創聖のアクエリオン』と『当事者』でした。
subtitles.english: They were "Sousei no Aquarion" and "Tojisha."

subtitles.original: And with this wonderful theme, we have this wonderful stage available.
subtitles.english: And with this wonderful theme, we have this wonderful stage available.

subtitles.original: Yes, that staff-san made for me. Thank you so much!
subtitles.english: Yes, that staff-san made for me. Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: It is a sci-fi spaceship. We're in space.
subtitles.english: It is a sci-fi spaceship. We're in space.

subtitles.original: Yes, this is an IRyS spaceship.
subtitles.english: Yes, this is an IRyS spaceship.

subtitles.original: Thank you very much. It's so pretty!
subtitles.english: Thank you very much. It's so pretty!

subtitles.original: とっても素敵なね、えっと、SFテーマの宇宙船、
subtitles.english: We have this really lovely, uh, sci-fi themed spaceship...

subtitles.original: 宇宙船？うん、宇宙船みたいな感じのステージになっています。
subtitles.english: ...Spaceship? Yeah, it's a stage that feels like a spaceship.

subtitles.original: And with this, I would like to say, please do tweet with the hashtag #IRySBDay...
subtitles.english: And with this, I would like to say, please do tweet with the hashtag #IRySBDay...

subtitles.original: ...while you're watching this to post your comments...
subtitles.english: ...while you're watching this to post your comments...

subtitles.original: ...and what you think of this live during the stream. Yay!
subtitles.english: ...and what you think of this live during the stream. Yay!

subtitles.original: 今回のハッシュタグ #IRySBDay で、ぜひ、えっと、このライブに関しての感想などありましたら、
subtitles.english: Please use the hashtag #IRySBDay to post your thoughts about this live...

subtitles.original: ぜひ呟いてください。イェーイ！
subtitles.english: ...if you have any. Yay!

subtitles.original: Alrighty then, I think we should start off strong with a wonderful guest medley!
subtitles.english: Alrighty then, I think we should start off strong with a wonderful guest medley!

subtitles.original: では早速ね、ゲストメドレーに行きたいと思います！
subtitles.english: So without further ado, let's move on to the guest medley!

subtitles.original: では、レッツゴー！どうぞ！
subtitles.english: Here we go! Please enjoy!

subtitles.original: 名前のない怪物
subtitles.english: Monster Without a Name

subtitles.original: Lyrics ・ Composition ryo(supercell)
subtitles.english: Lyrics ・ Composition ryo(supercell)

subtitles.original: 震え、似てるわ
subtitles.english: You're trembling, it looks like...

subtitles.original: 軋んだみたい
subtitles.english: ...you're creaking.

subtitles.original: 煉瓦の病棟で
subtitles.english: In the brick ward...

subtitles.original: うまく歌えなくて
subtitles.english: ...I couldn't sing well.

subtitles.original: 霧に煙る夜
subtitles.english: A night clouded in mist...

subtitles.original: 浮かべ赤い月
subtitles.english: ...where the red moon floats.

subtitles.original: ほら見て私を
subtitles.english: Look at me.

subtitles.original: 目を逸らさないで
subtitles.english: Don't look away.

subtitles.original: 黒い鉄格子のなかで
subtitles.english: Behind the black iron bars...

subtitles.original: 私は生まれてきたんだ
subtitles.english: ...is where I was born.

subtitles.original: 悪意の代償を願い
subtitles.english: Wishing for the price of malice...

subtitles.original: 望むがままにお前に
subtitles.english: ...just as you desired.
